entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds except cloudy over northern sections overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
